name: Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii Audio
summary: Learn about .ER files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Gamers who have homebrew-enabled their Wii or use the Dolphin emulator can download and play Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii. When downloaded, the game arrives as a .ZIP archive. Decompressing this archive allows you to view the game's constituent files.

The game's Music subdirectory contains a series of ER files. These files are used to play in-game music and sound effects. Many of the ER files that contain music are named for the level in which they are used.

instructions: You can use BrawlBox (Windows) or VideoLAN VLC media player (multiplatform) to open ER files and listen to the audio they contain.
BrawlBox and VideoLAN VLC media player can convert ER files to other audio formats. For example, VLC can convert ER files to the following formats:
